# NSButton.BezelStyle.accessoryBarAction

**Case**

A button style that you use for extra actions in an accessory toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
case accessoryBarAction
```

## Discussion

Use this style when you need to perform an action on a button that appears in an accessory or scope bar.



For design guidance, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/buttons].

## Toolbar

- **NSButton.BezelStyle.toolbar**: A button style that’s appropriate for a toolbar item.
- **NSButton.BezelStyle.accessoryBar**: A button style that’s typically used in the context of an accessory toolbar for buttons that narrow the focus of a search or other operation.
